            Independent policy analyst and consulting data
            scientist
            
            My story
            
            
            
            
            I am an economist by training with a solid background in
            statistics and econometrics. I have over 15 years of
            experience working in international organizations, where I
            acquired my hands-on expertise in designing and implementing
            diagnostic tools, advanced analytics and data visualizations
            applied to public policy and economic development.
            As a life-long learner (and nerdðŸ¤“!), I especially enjoy
            discovering new data science tools and techniques that can
            help tackling complex policy issues. I rely on open source
            software and I strive -to the extent possible- to make my
            own analytical work automated, open, collaborative and
            reproducible.
            Here are more details about my professional journey:
            
             CV-4pg (ENG)
             ||
            
             CV-4pg (ITA)
            
            
            
            
            
            
            Now
            These days I do consulting work somewhere at the
            intersection of Public Policy and Data Science (preferably
            using
            
            programming).
            I could help you with projects like these
            || Potrei assistervi in progetti come questi
            Reach out to me anytime if you want to chat!
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Luisa Maria Mimmi
